      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getNotificationEnabled()
      Retrieve whether a notification is shown when CacheWord is unlocked The default value can be changed by copying res/values/cacheword.xml to your project and editing it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CacheWordSettings

        public CacheWordSettings(Context context)
        Creates a CacheWordSettings object with all the default settings
        Parameters:
        context - your app's context, used to read SharedPreferences

    • Method Detail

      • getTimeoutSeconds

        public int getTimeoutSeconds()
        Retrieve the current timeout setting The default value can be changed by copying res/values/cacheword.xml to your project and editing it. The value is stored in SharedPreferences, so it will persist.
        Returns:
        the timeout in seconds

      • setTimeoutSeconds

        public void setTimeoutSeconds(int seconds)
        Sets the timeout, if a timeout is running it will be restarted with the new timeout value. The default value can be changed by copying res/values/cacheword.xml to your project and editing it. The value is stored in SharedPreferences, so it will persist.
        Parameters:
        seconds -

      • getVibrateSetting

        public boolean getVibrateSetting()
        Whether the notification shown when CacheWord is unlocked should vibrate device or not. The value is stored in SharedPreferences, so it will persist. Add the vibrate permission if you are not using manifestmerger.enabled=true: <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.VIBRATE" />
        Returns:
        true if vibration is allowed, false otherwise

      • setVibrateSetting

        public void setVibrateSetting(boolean vibrate)
        Set whether the notification shown when CacheWord is unlocked should vibrate device or not. The default value can be changed by copying res/values/cacheword.xml to your project and editing it. The value is stored in SharedPreferences, so it will persist.
        Parameters:
        vibrate -

      • getNotificationEnabled

        public boolean getNotificationEnabled()
        Retrieve whether a notification is shown when CacheWord is unlocked The default value can be changed by copying res/values/cacheword.xml to your project and editing it. The value is stored in SharedPreferences, so it will persist.
        Returns:
        true if the notification is enabled

      • setEnableNotification

        public void setEnableNotification(boolean enabled)
        Set whether to show a notification when CacheWord is unlocked. The default value can be changed by copying res/values/cacheword.xml to your project and editing it. The value is stored in SharedPreferences, so it will persist.
        Parameters:
        enabled -

      • setNotificationIntent

        public void setNotificationIntent(PendingIntent intent)
        Sets the intent that is executed when the user taps the unlocked notification. The default behavior is to lock the application. Passing null will revert to the default behavior.
        Parameters:
        intent - the pending intent to execute

      • getNotificationIntent

        public PendingIntent getNotificationIntent()
        The default intent is null, which causes the application to lock when the user taps the notification.
        Returns:
        instance of PendingIntent

      • updateWith

        public void updateWith(CacheWordSettings other)
